body_html:
this is actually a good feature to have, to take the mean at once over multiple dimensions.
And I think we can achieve this without any change to our backends (.contiguous().view(...).mean(...))

body:

And I think we can achieve this without any change to our backends (.contiguous().view(...).mean(...))
